name: Curse Escape
description:
You should be able to play with any controller!
(Instructions in game still for keyboard users)

Tips:
- Collect powerups to restore your deflect meter.
- Deflect in the air can be used to make you fall slower.
- You can only kill colored enemies when you match their color.

NOTE:
I do not take any credit in making the art or music for this game, the links to the respective free assets that I used are provided below. I only take credit for programming, making sound effects, and designing the game.
